name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Quality Engineer with a strong emphasis on **test automation** and **software testing**, leveraging 8 years of experience in the technology sector. Proficient in **Python**, **Git**, and **Shell scripting**, with hands-on skills in **Linux** environments and mobile technologies including **Android** and **QNX**. My expertise extends to using frameworks like **Pytest** and **Appium** for comprehensive testing solutions. I have a solid foundation in automotive communication protocols including **CAN** and **Ethernet**, which enhances my analytical skills and problem-solving capabilities. 
I excel in managing multiple projects with excellent time management and initiative, ensuring high-quality deliverables within tight deadlines while fostering continuous improvement. My diverse technical background, including **modern libraries and frameworks**, allows me to interface effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver robust quality assurance initiatives.
